items.sentence: Why don\'t you do something about the situation?
I\'ll agree to the terms if you lower the price.
I\'ll get in touch with you as soon as I arrive.
I\'ll have all this stuff ready for you by 2:30.
I\'ll make an effort to complete the work today.
Tom tried to prevent Mary from joining the army.
I\'m looking for someone who understands French.
Juggling is actually a lot easier than it looks.
Just be sure to leave your passport in the safe.
I still can\'t play guitar as well as I want to.
Your French is really good. Where did you study?
Your camera may be stolen if you leave it there.
I have got to leave here early tomorrow morning.
I have no idea where Tom actually hid the money.
I have no intention of meddling in your affairs.
I have nowhere near enough money to buy a house.
I have one older brother and one younger sister.
I\'m sure Tom will explain it to you eventually.
I\'m sure that Tom will be delighted to see you.
I\'ve got a magazine article I want to show you.
